mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.MEMBER_NICKNAME, C.PERFUME_BRAND, C.PERFUME_NAME, C.P_FILERENAME FROM REVIEW_TBL A INNER JOIN MEMBER_TBL B ON A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO INNER JOIN PERFUME_TBL C ON A.PERFUME_NO = C.PERFUME_NO ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC

SELECT A.*, B.MEMBER_NICKNAME, C.PERFUME_BRAND, C.PERFUME_NAME, C.PERFUME_PRICE, C.P_FILERENAME FROM REVIEW_TBL A INNER JOIN MEMBER_TBL B ON A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO INNER JOIN PERFUME_TBL C ON A.PERFUME_NO = C.PERFUME_NO WHERE REVIEW_NO=#{reviewNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW_TBL SET R_VIEW_COUNT = R_VIEW_COUNT+1 WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
